name: Target Locked
description:
Oh no. You and your space buddy are trapped in a cave full of hazards. You would use your jetpack, but it seems to have a strange malfunction... Work together to avoid danger and get to the surface!

Controls:

Player 1:

  • Move = A and D
  • Jump = W
  • Use Rocket = S

Player 2:

  • Move = Left and right arrow keys
  • Jump = Up arrow key
  • Use Rocket = Down arrow key
